segments.text: I hear you ’ re taking a music class . I didn ’ t know you ’ re interested in it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I ’ m not . I ’ Ve never had a music class before .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In my opinion , you ’ ll make it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ re having me on again .
segments.speaker: S2
